title: Wind Gusts
criteria: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued. Sustained 40 mph. Gusts to 58 mph. Specify estimate or measured.

title: Heavy Rain
call:
1.0" rain/hour or greater for urban areas.
1.5" rain/hour or greater for rural areas.
Fire Burn areas: ~0.5-0.75$quot; rain/hour or less.

title: Storm Damage
criteria:
Damage to structures (roof, siding, windows, etc).
Damage to vehicles (from hail or wind).
Trees or large limbs down.
Power/telephone poles or lines down.
Damage to arm equipment, machinery, etc.
